title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 88.2 - Other provisions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 88.2 - Other provisions

State Regulations

The following provisions shall apply to each person while
sport fishing in the Oyster Bay National Wildlife Refuge. (a) Each person shall secure and possess the
required State license. (b) Each
person shall comply with the applicable provisions of Federal law and
regulations. (c) Each person shall
comply with the applicable provisions of the laws and regulations of the State
unless further restricted by Federal law or regulations. (d) Each person shall comply with the terms
and conditions authorizing access or use of the wildlife refuge
areas. (e) Each person shall comply
with the provisions of this Part. Such special regulations are published in the

Federal Register and are available at the Target Rock National Wildlife Refuge
headquarters. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
88.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
